title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Glenwood Dunes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Glenwood Dunes                Glenwood Dunes        Dennis Gray, NPS Collection       Facility Hours Open Daily: 7:00 a.m. - 30 minutes past sunset  Parking for cars and trailers Restrooms Information board listing current park activities  Street Address / Road Intersection Corner of U.S. Highway 20 and Brummitt Road Chesterton, IN 46304 GPS Coordinates 041.38.55N 087.00.52W       Trails Glenwood Dunes Trail System - Glenwood Dunes, Calumet Dunes, and Dunewood Trace         Click image to view full trail map.        Visitor Activities  Ride your horse along the trail Cross-country ski when snow permits Hike the trail year-round  Fun Facts  Only trail in the national lakeshore that you can ride your own horse on
